Reviews.Title: “Not Bad at all”
Reviews.Author: MizzTC
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel six nights july booking via email hotel directly offered cheaper summer rate 200 aed inclusive airport daily shuttles malls beach stayed double twin beds adequate comfortable flat screen tv english speaking channels ac cleaned everyday location close city center reef mall taxis hotel helps hold hotel business card map directions hotel major road help taxi drivers front desk booking sweet faintly hear music nightclub 4th floor wasnt disturbing overall value money paid
